page: PH60116: Spintronics And Magnetoelectronic Materials And Devices

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: CreditsFundamentals of magnetism, Fundamentals of Semiconductor, Basic Principles of Electrical and Magnetic transport, Magnetic-Nonmagnetic multilayer-structures, Ferromagnetic Semiconductors, Half-metallic Ferromagnets, Anisotropic Magnetoresistance (AMR), Giant Magnetoresistance (GMR), Colossal Magnetoresistance (CMR), Spin-valve, Spin-diode, Spin-LED, Spin-transistor, Spin-FET, Magnetic Random Access Memory (MRAM), Magneto-logic Gates (magnetic AND, OR, NAND, NOR), Read-head of Computer Hard Disk.
